column4: hey does anyone know why java applet isnt wroking correctly in firefox?
its just a gray box that says java applet
but strangely i can here sounds comming from it
anyone know how to enable java applets on firefox?
do you also have icedtea installed
i remember sun java had issues with icedtea, i had to uninstall it to make sun java work
no, if you want sun java to work in your browser
then remove it and restart browser
and make sure you have sun-java6-plugin
i think it is just a compiler - if you dont gcc's gcj, then yes
anyway, you can install it later on anyway
